薰.definition: sweet-smelling grass; Coumarouna odorata; tonka beans; coumarin

薰心.definition: (of greed, lust etc) to dominate one's thoughts

薰蕕不同器.definition: lit. fragrant herbs and foul herbs do not go into the same vessel (idiom); bad people and good people do not mix

薰陶.definition: to seep in; to influence; to nurture; influence; training
